recipesJson.name: Cream Sha Boogie Bop
recipesJson.author: DIYDownunderPippa
recipesJson.description:
Retested after a 3 week steep and am very proud of how this turned out. It did everything as I wanted. The textures, mouthfeel and flavour id just on point! 
Oh yeh! This is Cream Sha Boogie Bop! 

- off the shake the mouth feel of the cream seems lovely followed up with some of the textual notes of the bakeries but I  will have to wait a few days to see if this starts playing "Cream Sha Boogie Bop". All going to plan the FA Cookie will help to achieve a little grainy texture to the combination of the other bakery concentrates that I hope will deliver a mixture of authentic profiterole pastry style notes. So far so good though.

reviews.text: This is DELICIOUS! Very nice Pippa
